import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate, Link, } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' function PlaceOrderScreen() { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const placeOrder = () =>{ console.log('place order') } return (

Shipping

Shipping: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.address}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? Your cart is empty : {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} X ${item.price} = {(item.qty * item.price).toFixed(2)} ))} }

Order Summary

 Item: ${cart.itemsPrice} Shipping: ${cart.shippingPrice} Tax: ${cart.taxPrice} Total: ${cart.totalPrice}
) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
